title.en: Choujigen Game Neptune: The Animation - Hello New World

description.en:
After years of fruitless war between the four realms of Gamindustri (Planeptune, Lastation, Lowee and Leanbox) over Share Energy, the source of their strength based on how much their people have faith in their goddesses, the four CPUs that rule over them have finally signed a treaty of friendship.

The Treaty prohibits any attempt to use military force to share energy in the hope of bringing peace and prosperity to their worlds.

And, a month after the deal, Neptune, the CPU goddess of Planeptune, spends her time playing games rather than doing her work, leaving the Shares of her land plummeting.

Choujigen Game Neptune – Hello New World. Choujigen Game Neptune Animation follows Neptune and her friends' attempts to collect Shares when grappling with an external challenge that could spell the end of both the Goddesses and Gamindustri themselves ...

(Source: Mangafast)
[hr][b]Portuguese(Br)[/b] [spoiler]Gamindustri é uma linda terra protegida por 4 deusas: Neptune, Noire, Blanc e Vert. Essas deusas protegem suas respectivas nações: Planetune, Lastation, Lowee e Leanbox e cidadãos de todas as ameaças. Havia inúmeras ocasiões que perigos inesperados ameaçavam este mundo, mas através de seus esforços, as deusas usaram seus poderes para salvar o mundo. Agora essas deusas que residiam acima, nos céus, tomaram formas temporárias para proteger os cidadãos junto a eles.[/spoiler]
